short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to hide media replies on Twitter/X so you can see text replies easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introduces two straightforward toggle switches in the top-right corner of your Twitter/X window, enabling you to hide media replies to posts. This feature helps deter engagement farming from viral posts and more.
